name: Mini Zeno
description:
Mini Zeno is a fast-paced platformer where you run through obstacles, defeat enemies, and collect items after the robotic uprising. You will play as G, a survivor of an apocalyptic city, where she must battle through enemies and past obstacles to survive and conquer the wasteland. G has an infinite amount of bullets but that will not stop enemies from chasing you.

For the best experience, play full-screen with a 1920x1080 resolution

Contributions: Aaron Cromis, Emily Legg, Garo Martinez, Saurin Patel, Hunter Gray
